description: Member of the front-end development team for a comprehensive academic records management website, utilizing React.js to create a responsive and user-friendly interface. Currently spearheading the integration of the backend system, developed in Django, with the front-end interface to ensure seamless functionality and data synchronization.

Designed and developed a dynamic website for Geotagged products. Took charge of Backend development utilizing PHP, ensuring seamless integration and functionality. Implemented jQuery to enhance user interactivity and improve overall user experience

Conducted extensive testing and evaluation of various image recognition models to assess vulnerabilities to adversarial attacks. Analyzed and compared the performance of different models to identify areas for improvement in robustness and security.
